# React Pokedex

Uma Pokedex criada usando React e Vite e consumindo informações da API [PokeApi](https://pokeapi.co/). O projeto pode ser visualizado clicando no [link](https://ruanlins.github.io/react-pokedex-ui/).

<div style="display: flex; justify-content: center;">
  <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/20525315/479720984-26019712-fbd5-4692-aa99-2551d16a7d89.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..YKPuD1ac7Uov4VysBTEBOZLj9XW4OVaMktjgyiwPDCA" width="700"/>
</div>

## Funcionalidades

- Interface responsiva.
<div style="display: flex; justify-content: center;">
  <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/20525315/479753882-ea77b401-3525-47ad-ac65-362844511979.gif?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..tGGAt1O6CMHa4l7prLK2vWItnpZyTn08Vq3urmGs4ck" width="500"/>
</div>
</br></br>

- Pesquisar por pokemons específicos.

<div style="display: flex; justify-content: center;">
  <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/20525315/479729047-ca046f06-8613-43b6-9e44-dccc5ec85fc3.gif?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..sORC_V2geJIgsGV6jkjw4s1o3_910qwlAktObj4KioQ" width="500"/>
</div>
</br></br>

- Adicionar e remover Pokemons da sua lista de favoritos usando a ContextAPI para armazenar e retirar informações do localstorage.

<div style="display: flex; justify-content: center;">
  <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/20525315/479729050-97b865d2-5939-4b1b-8af8-41ea7574ad7d.gif?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..PzTJwn7y4CaWzCzafzkfA3Sl69FbmoyTyMpJWf-lSuA" width="500"/>
</div>
</br></br>

- Alterar entre a visualização normal e shiny do Pokemon.

<div style="display: flex; justify-content: center;">
  <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/20525315/479755196-cf519dfb-4b12-43da-9f1b-d058c204aa48.gif?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..pdVDZZoIUq-0DQx2en1RQZd27B_o-jAhMIdIT72wwPE" width="500"/>
</div>
</br></br>

- Pesquisar aleatoriamento por Pokemons.

<div style="display: flex; justify-content: center;">
  <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/20525315/479761063-3bb91d90-65d7-4f1a-b97c-d036a6bd81af.gif?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..TIaC10Pev4XQDD6L87XQLX-O2rqVMI2QOaCKprTBxBQ" width="500"/>
</div>
